languages.text: "Ты ищешь знания потому, что тебе это нравится. Ну так делай то, что нравится, иначе зачем жить?"
"You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"
languages.original_text: "Ты ищешь знания потому, что тебе это нравится. Ну так делай то, что нравится, иначе зачем жить?"

traits.locale_text: "You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy; otherwise, what's the point of living?"
"You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy; otherwise, what's the point of living?"
"You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"
"You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"
"You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"

languages.text: “你寻求知识，因为这就是你喜欢做的事情。放手去做喜欢做的事情吧，否则活着还有什么意义呢？”
languages.original_text: "You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"

traits.locale_text: “你寻求知识，因为这就是你喜欢做的事情。放手去做喜欢做的事情吧，否则活着还有什么意义呢？”

languages.text: «Busca el conocimiento porque disfruta haciéndolo. Así que haga lo que le gusta. ¿Para qué sirve vivir si no?».
languages.original_text: "You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"

traits.locale_text: «Busca el conocimiento porque disfruta haciéndolo. Así que haga lo que le gusta. ¿Para qué sirve vivir si no?».

languages.text: 「お前が知識を求めるのは、それが楽しいからだ。ゆえにお前は楽しみを追い求めている。そうでなければ、生きている意味がないだろう？」
languages.original_text: "You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前が知識を求めるのは、それが楽しいからだ。ゆえにお前は楽しみを追い求めている。そうでなければ、生きている意味がないだろう？」

languages.text: "Ihr strebt nach Wissen, weil Euch das Freude bereitet. Also tut, was Euch Freude bereitet — welchen Sinn hat sonst das Leben?"
languages.original_text: "You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr strebt nach Wissen, weil Euch das Freude bereitet. Also tut, was Euch Freude bereitet — welchen Sinn hat sonst das Leben?"

languages.text: « Vous cherchez la connaissance parce que ça vous plaît. Alors faites ce qui vous plaît ; sinon, à quoi bon vivre ? »
languages.original_text: "You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous cherchez la connaissance parce que ça vous plaît. Alors faites ce qui vous plaît ; sinon, à quoi bon vivre ? »

languages.text: "İrfan arayışındasın çünkü bunu yapmaktan keyif alıyorsun. Yani keyif aldığın şeyi yapıyorsun. Aksi takdirde yaşamanın ne anlamı kalır ki?"
languages.original_text: "You seek knowledge because it's what you enjoy doing. So do what you enjoy — otherwise, what's the point of living?"

traits.locale_text: "İrfan arayışındasın çünkü bunu yapmaktan keyif alıyorsun. Yani keyif aldığın şeyi yapıyorsun, yoksa yaşamanın ne anlamı kalır ki?"
